languages.text: "Позволь ему скорбеть об утерянном, железный мон-кай. И не душить свое сердце. Только приняв боль можно двигаться дальше".
"Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."
languages.original_text: "Позволь ему скорбеть об утерянном, железный мон-кай. И не душить свое сердце. Только приняв боль можно двигаться дальше".

traits.locale_text: "Let him mourn the things he lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."
"Let him mourn the things he lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."
"Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."
"Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."
"Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."
"Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

languages.text: 「鉄のモン＝ケイよ。彼に失ったものを悼ませてやれ。心の声を押し殺すべきではない。痛みを受け入れてこそ、人は前に進めるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

traits.locale_text: 「鉄のモン＝ケイよ。彼に失ったものを悼ませてやれ。心の声を押し殺すべきではない。痛みを受け入れてこそ、人は前に進めるのだ」

languages.text: "Lasst ihn seine Verluste betrauern, Eisen-Chem-Pan-Sey. Er sollte die Stimme seines Herzens nicht unterdrücken. Erst nachdem der Schmerz akzeptiert wurde, geht es wieder vorwärts."
languages.original_text: "Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst ihn seine Verluste betrauern, Eisen-Chem-Pan-Sey. Er sollte die Stimme seines Herzens nicht unterdrücken. Erst nachdem der Schmerz akzeptiert wurde, geht es wieder vorwärts."

languages.text: «Deja que llore lo que ha perdido, mon-keigh de hierro. No debe callar la voz de su corazón. Para seguir avanzando, hay que aceptar el dolor».
languages.original_text: "Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

traits.locale_text: «Deja que llore lo que ha perdido, mon-keigh de hierro. No debe callar la voz de su corazón. Para seguir avanzando, hay que aceptar el dolor».

languages.text: “允许他为失去的东西哀悼吧，铁猴子。他不该压抑内心的声音，只有真正接纳了自己的痛苦，才能继续前进。”
languages.original_text: "Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

traits.locale_text: “允许他为失去的东西哀悼吧，铁猴子。他不该压抑内心的声音，只有真正接纳了自己的痛苦，才能继续前进。”

languages.text: "Bırak kaybettiklerinin yasını tutsun demir mon-keigh. Kalbinin sesini bastırmak iyi değildir. İnsan ancak acısını kabullendiğinde ilerleyebilir."
languages.original_text: "Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

traits.locale_text: "Bırak kaybettiklerinin yasını tutsun, demir mon-keigh. Kalbinin sesini bastırmak iyi değildir. İnsan ancak acısını kabullendiğinde ilerleyebilir."

languages.original_text: "Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

languages.text: « Laissez-le pleurer ce qu'il a perdu, mon-keigh de fer. Il ne doit pas étouffer la voix de son cœur. C'est seulement en acceptant sa douleur que l'on peut avancer. »
languages.original_text: "Let him mourn the things he has lost, iron mon-keigh. He should not smother the voice of his heart. Only after accepting one's pain can one move forward."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-le pleurer ce qu'il a perdu, mon-keigh de fer. Il ne doit pas étouffer la voix de son cœur. C'est seulement en acceptant sa douleur que l'on peut avancer. »
